message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it's worth $12,000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This represents a significant saving of $1,000 compared to the market value, making it an excellent opportunity for you. I look forward to hearing your response soon.
